Cypress Bay Broward Highschool high school GPA calculator

Hello!

Welcome to one of my projects. This was my first project and was created to calculate grade point averages for the Broward County school system(it may work for some others as well, i'm not sure though). I made this because the way it is calculated is a bit vague for both weighted and unweighted. Of course, you don't really need to read this summary, as there is instructions in both the manual calculation tab and the predictor tab.

Broward GPA calculator

This website provides manual documentation as well as an automated calculator to calculate and/or predict your GPA. Works for Cypress bay and Broward county as far as I have tested it. I am NOT responsible for anything that happens from these tools. Use them at your own risk.
